title: Direct regeneration of spent graphite anode material via a simple thermal treatment method
content:
Sustainable Energy Fuels, 2024, Advance Article
DOI: 10.1039/D3SE01552A, Paper
Xiaoxue Li, Baoyu Wu, Hao Sun, Kai Zhu, Yinyi Gao, Tianzeng Bao, Hongbin Wu, Dianxue Cao
This work reports a novel method for recycling spent graphite. The regenerated graphite exhibits a discharge capacity of 366 mA h gâˆ’1 at 1C.
